recital.text: The Stockbridge-Munsee Community, Band of Mohican Indians, is a federally recognized Indian tribe governed by the Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Council pursuant to authority vested in the Council by a Constitution approved in November 1937; and,
The Stockbridge-Munsee Community has the authority under Article VII, Section 1(f) of the Constitution and its inherent rights as a sovereign nation to adopt and amend ordinances; and,
The Stockbridge-Munsee Community desires to update and amend Chapter 40, the Land Ordinance in order to better reflect the current and future needs of the Community.
that the Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Council hereby adopts the amendments to Chapter 40, the Land ordinance.
